p: Finally, there are additional health-enhancing properties related to Bryophyllum sp., as it is the case of hepatoprotective, antidiabetic activities. Thus, the leaf juice and aqueous of B. pinnatum showed a marked in vivo hepatoprotective effect on carbon tetrachloride-induced hepatotoxicity in rats [ 72], as well as hypoglycemic and hypocholesterolemic effects in streptozotocin-induced diabetic rats [ 73].
